title: after 48 hours still no verification boosts.
body:
so i just verified my account more than two days ago and guess what,  im still waiting for my boosts and yesterday i sent a ticket and still no response it has been 52 hours im sick of waiting for this i need ip to start my champion pool everybody has 6300 champs and i still didnt even get 3200 ip. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
help.
pls.

replies.body: I pulled up your account, and you did actually already get that IP Boost on the 24th of this month.
